block.p: GOLDBERG-Rose. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Rose Goldberg, beloved sister of our dedicated Trustee, Dr. Edward and Sisterhood past President, Florence Zornberg. Deepest sympathy to them, children, Marcia Greenberg and David Goldberg, and the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President

GOLDBERG-Rose. Men's Club of Park East Synagogue regrets the passing of the sister of our longtime Board Member, Dr. Edward Zornberg. We extend sincere condolences to the entire family. Dr. Allan Goldberg, President Herman Hochberg, Chairman
